title: Country quiz
description: This is a project that built with react. This is one of the most changelling projects I've done during the time that we were studying. It about country quiz with two questions and four choices of answer where you can choose from.

title: Front end final
description: This is a website which we built with only html and sass. It is our final exam on html and css. It is a responsive page. It is a page about photograph.

title: Hit parade react
description: In this project, I work with react to create a website for songs. You can add a song, you can remove, you can see the lyrics of the song.

title: Birthday app
description: In this project, I work with vanilla javascript to creact a birthday app. The data for this app is from an API which means I fetch an API to get the data. You can add, edit, filter and remove the list.

title: Front end assessment
description: In this project, I work with html and sass to create this page. It is responsive and there is an image which you can see in the desktop view and cannot be seen in mobile view.

title: React random quote generator
description: In this project, I work with react to create a small page for randome quotes. You can only get a quote at a time, when you click on the down part of the page, it will bring you into anothe page for the quote details.
